entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Migrate off of EOL container images #110204
  • Part of the address disappears during the execution of the request #110202
  • Error restoring WebAPI project using .NET 9 #110201
  • Authentication validation failed with error - InvalidToken exception on .net #110184
  • Correctly handle H3_NO_ERROR when sending request content #110182
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests.LoggerMessageGeneratorParserTests.MultipleTypeDefinitions #110180
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Test.EmitterTests.TestEmitter #110179
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: System.Collections.TryGetValueTrue<BigStruct, BigStruct> Regression on 11/21/2024 6:45:46 PM #110191
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 11/18/2024 8:23:46 PM #110193
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: System.Collections.ContainsTrue<Int32> Regression on 11/22/2024 9:27:23 AM #110192
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 5 Regressions on 11/25/2024 10:09:05 AM #110190
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 1 Regression on 11/25/2024 12:12:36 AM #110188
  • Test Failure: JIT/jit64/opt/cg/cgstress/CgStress1_ro/CgStress1_ro.cmd #110176
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/stackoverflow/stackoverflowtester/stackoverflowtester.cmd #110173

Closed

  • System.Reflection.Emit `SetChecksum` produces invalid pdb #110096
    10.0.0
  • [.NET9 + WASM] LinkerConfig.xml no longer respected?!? #110181
  • Safer and performant EventSource calling patterns #36326
  • Test failed: new unknown error in reliability framework test #106853
    10.0.0
  • Test failed: reliability framework test hang #106852
    10.0.0
  • Referencing System.Text.Json 9.0.0 in a NativeAOT app targeting 8.0, with the 8.0 SDK, results in trim issues #110187
  • [API Proposal]: Add Message property to ExperimentalAttribute #107963
    Future
  • [wasi] Support `wasi-sockets` and `wasi-http` #98957
    10.0.0
  • Fuzzlyn: Assertion failed '!m_compiler->lvaInSsa(tree->GetLclNum())' during 'Assertion prop' #109971
    10.0.0
  • `Matrix4x4.CreateTranslation` The result is flipped over? #110170
  • Remove dotnet9 feeds from NuGet.config when dependencies publish into dotnet10 feeds #106593
    10.0.0
  • Linking Native AOT for android complains about -fPIC #109341
    Future
  • String comparer for sorting numeric strings logically #13979
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix `IDE0004` for object comparison #110206
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix System.Reflection.Emit `SetChecksum` creating invalid pdb #110205
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Tweak `EncodeToUtf16_Vector128` #110203
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add New "Area-Type-System-And-Startup" Github Group to Area Owners Doc #110200
    area-Meta
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update .NET 8 build images to use Azure Linux #110199
    needs-area-label
  • Update to .NET 10 build images #110198
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add MemoryExtensions overloads with comparer #110197
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Experiment with new ndk version #110196
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Allow optimizing mask conversions on x64 as well #110195
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NRBF] Fixes and fuzzing improvements #110194
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • Warn if RequiresXXXCode is placed on an entrypoint #110185
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix stubs for `HybridGlobalization` #110183
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, linkable-framework, os-browser
  • NamedPipeClientStream Connect with SafePipeHandle #110175
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] DATAS BGC thread synchronization fix #110174
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.1
  • Only update runtime maintenance-packages dependencies to latest when not in source-build #110172
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove useless complementary assertions #110171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Arm64-PAC: Add encoding for pointer authentication (PAC) instructions #110160
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix System.Reflection.Emit `SetChecksum` creating invalid pdb #110097
    bug, area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add a test to validate hostfxr C API #110169
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0 #109744
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow
  • [release/9.0-staging] Transfer ThreadPool local queue to high-pri queue on Task blocking #109989
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 9.0.1
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transfer ThreadPool local queue to high-pri queue on Task blocking #109990
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 8.0.12
  • [cdac] Handle hot/cold map lookup in `ExecutionManager.ReadyToRunJitManager.GetMethodInfo` #110087
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Use the managed signer to remove the code signature from singlefile bundles #110063
    area-HostModel, 10.0.0
  • Stop using LINQ in Tensors #109415
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Add Message property to ExperimentalAttribute #108216
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Switch back to unpinned 9.0 SDK for micro benchmarks #109992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use any reaching def for unreachable uses in incremental SSA builder #110077
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove dotnet9 nuget feeds #109149
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-staging] Ensure proper cleanup of key files when not persisting them #109844
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix transformer handling of boolean schemas in JsonSchemaExporter. #109975
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.x
  • Allow hiding `UnmanagedCallersOnly` exports #110152
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add configuration variables. #109907
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix an issue with sysconf returning the wrong last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors. #109749
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.1
  • Fix an issue with sysconf returning the wrong last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors #109567
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.12
  • Unhandled exception handler. #109806
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr

Updated

  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix hostfxr.h to be valid C again. #110060
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 9.0.1
  • Don't use a GVM in Linq Select with NAOT by default #109978
    area-System.Linq, size-reduction, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add global search option to 3-opt layout #110089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2590137 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [draft] Improve startup and warmup performance for invoke by reducing emit usage #109901
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 10.0.0
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [cDAC] Implement ReJIT portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #109936
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix handling of IDynamicInterfaceCastable wrt CastCache #110007
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.1
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix IDynamicInterfaceCastable with shared generic code #109918
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.1
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix obtaining type handles of IDynamicInterfaceCastableImplementation #109909
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.1
  • [Release/8.0] Fix FP state restore on macOS exception forwarding #109579
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.12
  • Avoid IndexOutOfRangeException in ZipArchive #109168
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] ILC: Allow OOB reference to upgrade framework assembly #110058
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] ILC: Allow OOB reference to upgrade framework assembly #110059
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Fix length check for Convert.TryToHexString{Lower} #109891
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • JIT: enable cloning of try regions #110020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix Matrix4x4.CreateReflection when D is not zero #110162
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][mini] Remove support for the Xamarin.iOS and Xamarin.Mac assemblies in the AOT compiler. #108886
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][interp] Defer compilation in bblocks with unitialized stack #108731
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Out of range exception on system without a WINS configuration #110165
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Add support for building with Clang 19 #109198
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.12
  • [ppc64le] Fixed System.Runtime.Intrinsics tests failures #110126
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Avoid generic virtual dispatch for frozen collections alternate lookup #108732
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [WASIp2] soft debugger via sockets #109584
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #109920
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • New GC decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Limit OpenSSL TLS Session cache for client SSL_CTX instances #110154
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    NO-MERGE, area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Re-try loading ENGINE keys with a non-NULL UI_METHOD #109782
    area-System.Security
  • [release/9.0-staging] Re-try loading ENGINE keys with a non-NULL UI_METHOD #109783
    area-System.Security
  • Update System.Speech to also recognize Speech_OneCore #110123
    area-System.Speech

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [SwiftBindings] Update TypeMetadataKind to include current extended values #2801

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Threads and GC Poll #2806

PullRequests

Created

  • [SwiftBindings] Added support for size, stride, alignment, and the value witness table #2813
  • Keep `LoaderAllocator` objects alive from continuations #2812
  • [SwiftBindings] Describe protocol constraints #2811
    area-SwiftBindings

Merged

  • [SwiftBindings] Add details to metadata accessors description #2810
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [SwiftBindings] Added missing types and renamed Protocol->Existential #2809
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [RuntimeAsync] Add support for async struct instance methods (potential implementation 2) #2805

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Follow-up on updating maintenance-packages dependencies conditioned to only DotNetBuildSourceOnly != true #45155
  • Color on Watch Run #45161
  • GlobalAnalyzerConfig broke with potential ordering change in .net 9 and no documentation tells you how to fix it #45150
  • Test CheckTargetFrameworkDisplayName often fails in CI #45148
  • LDAP server channel binding in System.DirectoryServices.Protocols #45136
  • How to build dotnet SDK? #45135
  • ILLInk fix the usage of treatWarningsAsErrors #45134

PullRequests

Created

  • Try to fix win-x86 windowsdesktop builds #45162
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-remove: Support for slnx #45160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect apphost being used when publishing for self-contained single-file with `NoBuild=true` #45159
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Support package@version syntax for dotnet workload search version #45156
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [VMR] Add verticals for Linux/Windows NativeAOT runtime packs #45154
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add hook for importing .props file after .NET SDK props #45151
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Better search versions error experience #45144
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add integration tests for dotnet test scenarios #45138
    Area-DotNet Test
  • File watcher improvements #45131
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Refresh browser for all transitively referencing projects #45095
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Improve error experience for Restore command without a project #45129
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add option to include/exclude previews to workload search version command Fixes #43890 #45149
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • randomize GetTestDestinationDirectoryPath #45130
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add implicit reference to `Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Internal.Assets` #44997
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fail in case of hybrid projects (new testing platform and vstest) in dotnet test #45133
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-DotNet Test
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #45118
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #45119
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add accidentally removed JS functions back #45124
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Blazor] Fix hot reload for components with collocated JS files #45120
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2590204 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable tests following the net10 transition #44931
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix: CLI Help missing package description #44954
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move test templates to SDK repo #44417
    Area-DotNet Test, Area-Templates
  • Re-enable scenario-tests execution in VMR #45109
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use arcade infra for DEB and RPM build #45047
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for `dotnet sln add file` and `dotnet sln add folder` #45072
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • Remove manual home variable lookup #44266
    Review for breaking changes, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Factor Hot Reload agent implementation into a source package #44899
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Support publishing of multi-architecture OCI container images #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • upgraded logging for #595 log url when connection is closed #44953
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • WIP - Add fantomas formatting support #44801
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not create custom instances of TestAssetsManager in tests, use SdkTest base instead #45071
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refresh browser for all transitively referencing projects #45096
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, Area-Watch

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: try-catch with fallback #8686

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Interceptors #7009
    Working Set
  • The design space for extensions #8548

PullRequests

Merged

  • Queue pattern/reachability topic #8689
  • Queue discussion for iterator breaking change #8688

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `#pragma warning disable` for analyzers triggers IDE0079 inappropriately #76106
    17.13
  • UnscopedRef can be different in interface implementation, leading to ref safety holes #76100
  • IDE0031 doesn't account for "is not null" #76093
    Backlog
  • Support rewriting `string.Remove` in IDE0057 "Use range operator" #76091
    Backlog
  • Enumerators fails to set state to "after" in various scenarios observable with `GetEnumerator()` #76089
    Backlog
  • Synthesized delegates allow ref safety holes on the boundary of old and updated rules #76087
  • IDE0301 code fixer in ternary expression produces invalid C# code (CS0029) #76085
  • Area - Formatting - 5 #76084
    Backlog

Closed

  • IDE0301 wrongly alters the collection type of ICollection<T> property. #76092
    Backlog
  • IDE0004 false positive when using GetType() #75424
    17.13
  • "Unmerged changes" should use merge markers to mark refactoring conflicts across multiple targets #74366
    17.13
  • C# completion offered for explicit static interface method declaration generates code with several issues #70458
    Backlog
  • Explicit interface member completion doesn't work with params collections #72224
    Backlog
  • [IntelliSense] Suggest names of remaining explicitly implementable members after dotting an implemented interface without typing the return type #75435
    Backlog
  • Analyzer to simplify LINQ expressions by using an overload that accepts a Func<TSource,TResult> #75845
    Backlog
  • Diagnostic suppressor seems to work only for open files #75291
  • Action `Convert to full property` generates erroneous code for semi-auto properties #75547
    17.13
  • SymbolFinder.FindReferencesAsync not returning references used as base constructor #73704
    Backlog
  • `IDE0004` false positive when `object` is cast to `dynamic` #71695
    17.13
  • Reference highlight doesn't highlight references/usages of type aliases #74384
    17.13
  • Support `ExperimentalAttribute.Message` #75221
    17.13 P2
  • Customizable Exclamation Mark (!) Color in C# #75125
  • Reference highlighting doesn't work for some types from constructor expression #74803
  • Code action "Allow unsafe code in this project" has no effect #74472
    17.13
  • Deconstruct receiver ref escape is not considered #75850
    17.13 P2
  • Load Roslyn Analyzers from VS #74941
    17.12
  • OrganizeDocument: ArgumentException: The specified SnapshotPoint is on a different ITextSnapshot than this SnapshotPoint. #74594
    Backlog
  • "Use Collection Expressions" suggestion still appears even with multiple target frameworks, including those that target C# versions without support for collection expressions #75807
  • Allow Source Generation based on down stream project references #75703
  • All Quick Actions should have assignable shortcuts #75693
  • Suggested changes to VS2022 shortcuts (highly recommended) #75691
  • Comment option in the settings in VS VB #75686
  • Searching for References should have a simply UI button that excludes references from unit test projects #75685
  • Empty lines removal 1,2,3,4, #75656
  • Refactoring shows doubled "Preview, fix all in" links #75633
  • `readonly` modifier recommended on non-fields inside non-struct types #75625
  • Make `langword` a first-class citizen attribute of the `<see />` tag #75597
    Backlog
  • Regression in .NET 9 RC2: IDE0052 reports false positive with source-generated method #75483
    Backlog
  • Go to definition opens metadata instead of source file for project reference #75480
  • [Code refactor proposal] Split/merge multiple attributes into/from separate attribute lists #75411
    Backlog
  • [New API] IsIterator field on DeclarationModifiers type #75388
  • Make fixer for `CS0535` smarter when implementing `IEnumerable<T>` #67023
    Backlog
  • Add "Copy Error Message Text" button to syntax error popups in the Visual Studio text editor #75131
  • Provide a means to automatically generate declarations for out parameters to a method #75130
  • Collapse to Definition when loading a file #75129
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio unable to suggest "using static" expressions as quick fix #75127
  • Setting to fully qualify automatic imports of missing 'using' directive #75124
  • borders for selected reference #75123
  • Syntax highlighting missing from just the active C# file in a Visual Basic project on second vertical document group when solution opened #75109
  • [Feature] Collapse multiple leading #pragma lines #74897
    Backlog
  • Should collapse separate comment blocks separately #74816
    Backlog
  • Advanced analysis options are unreliable, confusing and poorly documented #74788
  • Sourcelink does not debug merged partial classes #74787
    17.13
  • Usage of Activator.CreateInstance won't show in references on the constructor, so there is misleading info! #74774
  • "Find All References" does not find all the associated references of namespaces #74718
    Backlog
  • Go To Definition stops working #74756
  • Created Template Item not duplicated exactly when added #74717
  • Refactor "Move type to file" should re-evaluate file header template #74703
  • False positive IDE0001 when using extern alias #74681
  • Quick info stopped working #74644
  • Go to Definition doesn't work sometimes, and I have to retype the symbol to make it work #74631
  • Go to definitiion not working. #74621
  • Code issues #74614
  • Implement generic interface method with `allows ref struct` constraint #74605
  • c# - Renaming a field can cause it to rename the same word in the comments in other files in the same project that are completely unrelated #74577
  • MS.CA.LanguageServer depends on MS.VS.Telemetry via Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Remote.Workspaces #74568
    17.13
  • typeof(T) and "using OfficeOpenXml.FormulaParsing.Excel.Functions.Text" #74528
  • Replacement param for obsolete method #74522
  • Code Search should display namespace of types found #74521
  • Improvement for refactoring IDE0046 "Convert to conditional expression" using null coalescing #74516
    Backlog
  • Adding `_` (discard) in front of evaluation auto-completes to first symbol name match for `_` (underscore) #74473
    17.13
  • Go to definition is not consistent with C# compilation when a symbol is missing #74443
  • See squigglies in #if'd code but Quick Actions don't work. #74438
    Backlog
  • Syntax highlight is half broken in both VS 17.10 and VS 17.11 P3 #74422
  • Hovering over a method gives the wrong overload #74418
  • `ref` modifier keyword is missing from completions for `ref struct` primary constructor parameter definition #74386
  • Visual Studio 2022 error list doesn't show errors from build failures in Build + Intellisense view #74380
  • Autocomplete (Intellisense) doesn't work correctly in project that references another project which has source generated files #74368
  • IntelliCode-suggested completions don't escape keywords properly #74253
  • Suppress No Longer Showing in Error List #74228
    Backlog
  • Rename 'class1' to 'Class1' lingers after IDE1006 fixer #74217
  • Add IL Viewer for .NET languages #74080
  • Add string to NameOf option in intellisense #74079
  • Automatic class initialization scaffolding #74078
  • Add assembly version information to method tooltips #74077
  • [Bug] IDE0058 not work #74073
  • Compiler chooses params span overload in expression trees leading to errors #73743
    17.13
  • Task List filtering for current project doesn't work as expected #73983
  • [Bug]: Code fix `Convert to regular constructor` generates incorrectly for class without body #72340
    Backlog
  • PostProcessChangesAsync(Document, CancellationToken) is not called anymore #73957
    Backlog
  • Test performance regression between 4.8 and 4.9.2, still there in 4.10 #73956
  • `Remove unused using` showing up multiple times in lightbulb #73893
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio Inserting Duplicate "Option Strict On" in VB.NET Class files #73827
    Backlog
  • Enable argument wrapping code fix for collection expressions #73826
    Backlog
  • Please add support for colorizing c# code that happens to be in raw string literals. #73822
  • Version 17.10.0 Preview 5.0 - Error list not showing all warnings #73801
  • Error list goes crazy while doing a refactoring #73800
    18.0
  • Method defining line move when adding code before method declaration #73799
    Backlog
  • Adding/Removing space when toggling line comments #73796
    Backlog
  • Adding documents to a VisualStudioWorkspace in a subfolder fails if folder doesn't exist #73783
    Backlog
  • Account for partial properties at existing use sites of partial method symbol APIs #73772
    Backlog
  • Allow manually forcing a refresh of the IntelliSense database #73693
  • Move more logic from the Controller.Session down to the SignatureHelpService #73678
  • C# needs a feature to "Show all called methods" for any given method implementation. #73669
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Account for always true/false patterns in control flow analysis #76109
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect codespit of xml doc comments #76108
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Flatten SourceMethodSymbol hierarchy #76107
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update runtime async format to use methodimpl #76105
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, New Feature - Runtime Async
  • Set state of enumerator object to "after" during disposal #76090
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update config data for 17.13P2 snap of VS #76088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Do not offer to simplify a set to a collection expr when assigning to a non-set interface #76096
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove integration test project to unblock dev inner loop #76104
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Do not remove cast that would change what runtime type a virtual method dispatches to #76102
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Use git conflict markers when we cannot merge text #76099
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Enhance explicit interface implementation completion provider #75568
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Support selector pattern simplification in linq queries #76086
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Preserve existing accessor bodies when converting from an auto prop to a full prop #76103
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update FindRefs to find constructor references in a primary constructor base type #76097
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix issue offering to remove an necessary cast to dynamic #76098
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix FAR on an alias to a predefined type #76101
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Support ExperimentalAttribute.Message #76060
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Reduce allocations from NamedTypeSymbol.AddOperators usage #76082
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • [vscode] Fix failing official builds #76071
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix Sort Usings in Inline Diff #74645
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update 'implement interface' to forward explicit members to implicit ones #76044
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix 'create constructor' with types without bodies #76083
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add a helper to determine if a type has a specific attribute or not. #76053
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Honour users' settings as a starting point for Razor formatting #76066
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Bump versions of dependencies coming from maintenance-packages #76076
    Area-Infrastructure, Blocked, untriaged
  • Consider RefSafetyRules with UnscopedRef #75930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use partial analysis results to filter out analyzers that need to be executed. #76062
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Avoid reusing temps whose refs might be captured #76009
    Area-Compilers
  • [LoongArch64]: Add loongarch64 architecture to roslyn #76064
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Update Copilot rename telemetry #76045
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Support modifiers with simple lambda parameters. #75400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update package versions and remove unnecessary EOL package references #76073
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [Draft] Update Razor DynamicFile Provider #76050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Restrict some types in object initializer setters when not directly settable #75507
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Onboard C# advanced pages to unified settings #75493
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Razor class library doesn't add associated Js file generated by typescript. #59188
  • CSS isolation isn't working because the css is added in the wrong order #59186
  • Migrate off of EOL container images #59185
  • Support registering OpenApiOperationTransformer via extension method for Minimal APIs #59180
    10.0-preview1
  • Perf regression: antiforgery-generation, fortunes_dapper, https #59178
  • 8.0 Helix matrix failing to find JDK #59177
    8.0.12
  • Blazor issue with Akamai #59176
  • OpenAPI document names are case-sensitive in urls #59175
  • Blazor WASM not supported from Microsoft.SemanticKernel.PromptTemplates.Handlebars from version >= 1.16 #59173
  • OpenApi generates the same schema for generic types with a JsonConverterFactory. #59172
  • `TypeLoadException`s on .NET 9 when referencing HttpSys on Linux #59166
  • publishing a web api (net 9) is not correct #59165
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json_middleware #59158
  • Open API generation: missing required option '--project'. #59157
  • Feature request to add correlation id to SignalR clients #59156
  • How to prevent http-client.env.json copy to publish directory? #59154

Closed

  • Does Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Client support AOT? #59133
  • Perf regression: caching, single_query #59099
  • Perf regression: json #59159
  • New contributor documentation improvements for repo #24575
  • inheritdoc doesn't show on docs browser #26434
  • Virtual machine (or some other means) of making it easy for the community to build from source #26661
  • When building the entire aspnetcore repo (i.e. inside the VMR) desktop msbuild is chosen #58985
  • Latest version 9.0.0 does not support .net core 8 #59115
  • 8.0 Templates.Mvc.Tests consistently timing out on Debian machines #56953
    9.0.0
  • [Blazor] Blazor Server - ObjectDisposedException with Scoped Services in Blazor Server During Disconnections #58887
  • Loading an mp4 video static asset in Blazor returns http 416 error #58829
    9.0.x
  • Static web assets blazor, ability to exclude appsettings (or other files) #59163
  • Uncaught SyntaxError: Unexpected token '<' in Angular 7.3 and .net 8 Application #59169
  • NET 9: VS 2022 Hybrid Blazor Projekt FluentUI Blazor {PROJECT_NAME}.styles.css. in Blazor Web #59161
  • OpenAPI do not support JsonOptions for MVC #59162
  • -BuildManaged -BuildInstallers doesn't work as installer build too early #58984
  • Perf regression: https #59148

PullRequests

Created

  • Add direct reference to System.Runtime.Caching in tools #59187
    area-commandlinetools
  • [release/8.0] Fix java discovery in helix-matrix #59181
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Add empty Pack target to .wixproj #59174
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Don't overbuild when the ProjectToBuild / -projects flag is passed in #59170
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Return 206 Partial Content on Valid Range for Static Assets #59160
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Remove Inputs&Outputs from GenerateDirectoryBuildFiles #59164
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Build installers at the end of the repo build and allow building with desktop msbuild #58987
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24573.1 #59134
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/9.0] Fix IIS outofprocess to remove WebSocket compression handshake #58931
    Servicing-approved, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0.x
  • Add pre-commit hook with code formatting #58965
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix source build when using `--no-build-js` #59118
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `1204d63` to `d144031` #59033
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6dae7eb` to `d144031` #59032
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.x
  • perf: improve allocations in `OwinEnvironment` #58917
    Perf, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-26

Issues

Created

  • Migrate off of Debian 11 #5064

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add CancellationToken to WebAuthenticator #26137
  • Templates missing Localization #26136
    .NET 9 SR2

    .NET 9 Servicing
  • The keyboard requires an additional stroke to move to the next control from the Graph: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_FocusOrder. #26127

  • Add TryGetValue() to IPreferences #26123
  • HybridWebView crashes Maui App built with .Net 9.0.1 GA / Windows on ARM / 23H2 #26116
    Backlog
  • Shell.TitleView is not replacing the Shell.Title on iOS 18 iPad only. #26114

Closed

  • IL2026 Trim warning from Microsoft.Maui.Controls.SourceGen.CodeBehindGenerator #26115
  • iOS BackButton Title cannot be set to string.Empty or "" #25742
    Backlog
  • In the component Entry, ClearButtonVisibility="WhileEditing" doesn't work. #25225
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Throw on RelationalEventId.MigrationsNotFound by default #35218
    10.0.0
  • Query/Perf: Compile identifier lambdas passed to PopulateIncludeCollection rather than inline #35212
  • Query/Perf: deep investigation on shaper perf changes regarding AOT #35210
  • Query/Perf: don't compile liftable constant resolvers in interpretation mode when the resolver itself contains a lambda #35208

Closed

  • Sqlite db corrupted by log (!) entries #35215
  • DbParameters with same name in FromSql/SqlQueryRaw get incorrectly deduplicated #35196
    10.0.0
  • Consider simplifying SQL parameter names (`@__city_0` -> `@city`) #35113
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix to #35212 - Query/Perf: Compile identifier lambdas passed to PopulateIncludeCollection rather than inline #35217
    Servicing-approved, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0] Return null when the type is nullable for Cosmos Max/Min/Average #35216
    Servicing-consider, 9.0.x
  • Remove ORDER BY applied to singleton queries #35214
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix to #35208 - Query/Perf: don't compile liftable constant resolvers in interpretation mode #35211
    Servicing-consider, 9.0.x

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Correct VisitUnary operand evaluation in funcletizer (#35172) #35203
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/9.0] Add missing Converts when simplifying in funcletizer (#35122) #35202
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/9.0] Fix TPC equality check inside subquery predicate (#35120) #35201
    Servicing-approved
  • Simplify parameter names #35200
  • Fix to #35212 - Query/Perf: Compile identifier lambdas passed to PopulateIncludeCollection rather than inline #35213
  • Return null when the type is nullable for Cosmos Max/Min/Average #35173
  • Fix to #35208 - Query/Perf: don't compile liftable constant resolvers in interpretation mode #35209

Updated

  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix to #35206 - Query/Perf: don't use Invoke in value comparer lambdas when constructing shaper with PopulateCollection #35207
    Servicing-consider, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0] Enable Cosmos vector search on EF9 #35183
    Servicing-approved, 9.0.x
  • Add support for database window functions - WIP #34258
  • Associate the DatabaseRoot with the scoped options instance and not the singleton options. #34477
